CustomField.formula: and( NOT(isblank(Parent_1_Suburb__c)), NOT(isblank(Parent_1_Street__c)), NOT(isblank(text(Parent_1_State__c))), NOT(isblank( Parent_1_Post_Code__c )), OR( NOT(isblank( Parent_1_Home_Phone__c )), NOT(isblank( Parent_1_Mobile__c )),NOT(isblank( Parent_1_Email__c )) ))
CustomField.label: Family Contact Details Provided
